  • Method Details

    • getJsonFromAsset

      public static String getJsonFromAsset(android.content.Context context, String assetName)
      Reads a JSON file from assets and returns its content as a string.
      Parameters:
      context - the context to access the assets.
      assetName - the name of the asset JSON file to read.
      Returns:
      the content of the JSON file as a string.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if a runtime error occurs.

    • getObjArrayFromJson

      public static <T> T[] getObjArrayFromJson(String jsonKey, String data, Class<T[]> clazz)
      Parses a JSON string and returns its content as an array of objects of type T.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the objects.
      Parameters:
      jsonKey - the key to the array in the JSON data.
      data - the JSON data.
      clazz - the class of type T.
      Returns:
      an array of objects of type T.

    • getObjFromJson

      public static <T> T getObjFromJson(String data, Class<T> clazz)
      Parses a JSON string and returns its content as an object of type T.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the object.
      Parameters:
      data - the JSON data.
      clazz - the class of type T.
      Returns:
      an object of type T.

    • getFlightDbObjsFromPojo

      public static Flight[] getFlightDbObjsFromPojo(FlightPOJO pojo)
      Converts a FlightPOJO object into an array of Flight objects.
      Parameters:
      pojo - the FlightPOJO object.
      Returns:
      an array of Flight objects.

    • getSqlDateFromUtilDate

      public static Date getSqlDateFromUtilDate(Date from)
      Converts a java.util.Date object into a java.sql.Date object.
      Parameters:
      from - the java.util.Date object.
      Returns:
      a java.sql.Date object with the same time as the input, or null if the input is null.
